IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: PRIMARY AND SPECIALTY HEALTHCARE TO ALL RESIDENTS.
IRS990.MissionDescription: COMMUNITY CLINICAL SERVICES, INC. IS A NOT-FOR-PROFIT, PHYSICIAN PRACTICE GROUP WHICH PROVIDES PRIMARY AND SPECIALTY HEALTHCARE SERVICES TO RESIDENTS IN THE SURROUNDING COMMUNITY REGARDLESS OF THE ABILITY TO PAY.
IRS990.Description: INTERNAL MEDICINE: MEDICAL CARE FOR ADULTS 16 YEARS AND OLDER. 2010 VISITS - 23,610

Activity2.Description: FAMILY PRACTICE: MEDICAL CARE FOR INFANTS, CHILDREN, AND ADULTS. 2010 VISITS - 19,223

Activity3.Description: BEHAVIORAL MEDICINE: PSYCHIATRIC CARE FOR CHILDREN AND ADULTS. 2010 VISITS - 42,652

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: NET ASSETS RELEASED FROM RESTRICTION -9,463. INCOME GUARANTEE 4,230,538. INTERCOMPANY TRANSFERS -1,047,956.

Form990ScheduleJPartIII.Explanation: LEO MYLES RECEIVED A SUPPLEMENTAL EMPLOYEE RETIREMENT PLAN CONTRIBUTION OF $182,000. THE AMOUNT IS INCLUDED IN TAXABLE WAGES IN 2010. JAMES CASSIDY RECEIVED A SUPPLEMENTAL EMPLOYEE RETIREMENT PLAN CONTRIBUTION OF $136,381. THE AMOUNT IS INCLUDED IN TAXABLE WAGES IN 2010.

GeneralExplanation.Explanation: ALL INTERNAL MEDICINE AND FAMILY PRACTICES, EXCEPT B-STREET, BECAME PART OF SMRMC PROVIDER BASED PROGRAMS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION HAS MEMBERS THAT CAN ELECT OTHER MEMBERS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: APPROVAL OF THE MEMBERS IS REQUIRED FOR ALL ACTIONS INVOLVING ETHICAL AND RELIGIOUS DIRECTIVES AND THE DISOLUTION OR MERGER OF THE ORGANIZATION.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: FORM 990 IS PROVIDED TO THE BOARD MEMBERS AND REVIEWED AT THE JULY MEETING.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THIS PROCESS IS THE RESPONSIBILITY OF ORGANIZATIONAL INTEGRITY OFFICER. A FORM IS USUALLY SUBMITTED TO ALL LEADERSHIP, BOARD MEMBERS, BOARD COMMITTEE MEMBERS, EMPLOYED PHYSICIANS, MEDICAL DIRECTORS AND CERTAIN EMPLOYEES IN KEY POSITIONS (I.E. PURCHASING STAFF) ANNUALLY TO BE COMPLETED. REMINDERS ARE USUALLY SENT TO MAKE CERTAIN ALL CONFLICT OF INTEREST FORMS ARE RETURNED.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: AN EXTERNAL COMPENSATION FIRM DOES A COMPENSATION SURVEY FOR THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR POSITION AND THE COMPENSATION PACKAGE IS REVIEWED BY THE BOARD.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDES FORM 1023, FORM 990 AND FORM 990-T TO THE PUBLIC WHEN REQUESTED. THE ORGANIZATION DOES NOT CURRENTLY PROVIDE ACCESS TO GOVERNING DOCUMENTS CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY OR FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: CHANGES IN NET ASSETS OR FUND BALANCES:
